common.bypass: 注意：该网站试图绕过 Revoke.cash 确认窗口。请谨慎操作。

domain_analysis.install_for_coverage: 安装获取 3 万美元诈骗保险
domain_analysis.no_issues_found_description: 我们的合作伙伴 Kerberus 已扫描该域名，未发现任何问题。
domain_analysis.risk_detected: 域名检查：检测到安全风险
domain_analysis.risk_detected_description: 我们的合作伙伴 Kerberus 已扫描此域名，发现存在潜在安全风险。建议避开此域名或谨慎操作。

common.error_occurred: 如果你在尝试创建 Revoke.cash 弹出窗口时出错。请在 <discord-link>Discord</discord-link> 中联系我们。

confirm_hash.explanation: 这可以用来列出待售的 NFT 或授权资产转让。请确认您信任此网站。
confirm_hash.title: 签署哈希签名

confirm_listing.title: 签署 NFT 市场清单

ad_warnings.info_text: Ad Warnings detect and highlight sponsored results and advertisements on popular crypto platforms including Google, CoinGecko, DexTools, and DexScreener. Scammers often use these ad placements to impersonate legitimate projects and direct users to phishing sites. This feature helps you identify and avoid these malicious ads.
ad_warnings.subtitle: Catch spoofed sites before you click
ad_warnings.title: Ad Warnings

approvals.label_placeholder: Name of Wallet. Ex: Main Vault
approvals.no_approvals: No approvals found for this wallet yet.
approvals.no_wallets_message: No wallets yet. Add a wallet to start tracking approvals.
approvals.title: Approvals
approvals.watchlist_subtitle: We only watch addresses. No seed phrases. No signing.

checks.covered_events: I agree that my claim is covered under the covered events list
checks.kyc: I agree that a successful KYC process might be required for me to receive payout
checks.share_information: I agree to share information about my claim and activities with the investigations team from Fairside

claim_modal.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree that Fairside may contact you to collect details and documentation related to the incident. Coverage is subject to Fairside’s policy terms & exclusions.
claim_modal.incomplete_hint: Please agree to all items to continue
claim_modal.subtitle: To initiate the claim process with Fairside, please confirm the following:
claim_modal.title: Start a claim

malicious.description: Drainer contracts our simulator didn’t flag
malicious.title: Malicious Transactions

permit.description: Malicious permit exploits that bypass detection
permit.title: Permit Signatures

fee_modal.disclaimer: Coverage provided by Fairside. Subject to policy terms & exclusions.
fee_modal.fee_note: 0.8% fee per transaction · No fees when off
fee_modal.subtitle: Get your money back if our warnings miss a scam
fee_modal.title: Wallet Drain Coverage

features.coverage_off_warning: Your theft safety net is OFF. Turn ON to receive full benefits

disable_modal.bullet_no_fee: No fee is charged when coverage is OFF
disable_modal.description: You’ll turn OFF Coverage (0.8% fee stops applying). You’ll still keep other features you have toggled on. Not recommended.
disable_modal.title: Turn off coverage?

address_guard.info: Address poisoning is a scam where attackers send small amounts from addresses that look similar to ones you interact with. This feature flags suspicious addresses on blockchain explorers like Etherscan, helping you avoid accidentally copying a scammer's address.
address_guard.title: Address Poisoning Detection

antiphish.info: When enabled, known phishing and malicious sites are blocked before they load. You can still bypass temporarily or allow a domain for 24 hours if you are sure it is safe.
antiphish.title: Phishing Protection

coverage.info: If your wallet is drained despite using our protection, you may be eligible for coverage up to $30,000. This insurance-style protection gives you peace of mind when interacting with DeFi protocols and signing transactions.
coverage.title: Wallet Drain Coverage

ethos_score.description: Shows credibility scores on X profiles
ethos_score.info: Ethos provides credibility scores for X (Twitter) profiles based on their on-chain and social activity. These scores help you quickly assess the trustworthiness of accounts before interacting with their content or clicking their links.
ethos_score.title: Ethos Credibility Scores

slowmode.description: Adds intentional delay before confirming transactions
slowmode.info: Slow Mode adds a mandatory waiting period before you can confirm transactions. This built-in delay forces you to slow down and review transaction details carefully, helping prevent rushed decisions that could lead to losses.
slowmode.title: Slow Mode

x_op_detector.description: Identifies original poster and malicious copycat accounts
x_op_detector.info: Scammers often copy legitimate crypto projects on X (Twitter) by using similar names and profile pictures. This detector identifies the original poster (OP) of a tweet and flags potential impersonator accounts (NOP - Not Original Poster) to protect you from phishing links.
x_op_detector.title: X OP/NOP Detector

main.coverage_notice: Wallet Drain Coverage adds 0.8% to covered transactions.

settings_panel.manage_wallets_desc: Add, label, or remove watched wallets

info.description: The Transaction Simulator analyzes your transaction, showing you exactly what will happen - including token transfers, approvals, and potential security risks.
info.every_transaction: Show Every Transaction: Always displays the simulation popup for every transaction.
info.first_time: First time + on warnings: Shows the summary the first time you use a dApp. After that, it only appears if a warning is detected.
info.warnings_only: Only on warnings: Only displays when a warning is detected.

every_transaction.description: Always show simulation popup for every transaction.
every_transaction.title: Show Every Transaction

mixed.description: Show summary first time you use a dApp, and again if warnings are detected.
mixed.title: First time + on warnings (Recommended)

warnings_only.description: Only show if we detect a problem. Never show on first use.
warnings_only.title: Only on warnings

landing.title: Your wallet just made a new best friend
landing.description: We partnered with Fairside to bring your wallet a Swiss Army knife for your bankless journey — all-new look, smarter defenses, and coverage built in.
landing.coverage_note: Coverage for malicious transactions and address poisoning has a fee of 0.8% per transaction while coverage is ON. You can turn off this feature at any time.

watchlist.title: Wallet Watchlist
watchlist.description: Add wallets to your watchlist and name them. Monitor approvals. Get exploit alerts. With revoking just a click away.

risk.label: THE RISK
risk.title: Open approvals can drain wallets.
risk.body: Compromised protocols can use your existing token permissions to drain your wallets. Even with previously safe protocols, they can get hacked and take advantage of outstanding approvals to then drain your assets.

yours.label: YOUR WATCHLIST
yours.title: Track 5 wallets. Revoke fast.
yours.body: Monitor all your approvals in one place. Quickly access Revoke.Cash to revoke approvals. The fastest and simplest way to stay safe from potential future compromises.

simulator.title: Transaction Simulator
simulator.description: See what happens before you sign. Know exactly what leaves and enters your wallet.

preview.title: WHAT WILL HAPPEN
preview.critical_desc: This contract is flagged as malicious.

attack.label: THE ATTACK
attack.title: Scammers count on you moving fast
attack.body: Many wallets abstract transaction details or use confusing interfaces. Attackers exploit this by hiding malicious actions behind innocent-looking signatures.

shield.label: YOUR SHIELD
shield.title: See Before You Sign
shield.body: Every transaction is simulated in advance. We cross-reference real-time threat intelligence databases to warn you of malicious contracts.

address.title: Address Poisoning Guard
address.description: Scammers inject lookalike addresses to steal your funds. We let you know.

attack.label: THE ATTACK
attack.title: Scammers create lookalike addresses and send you $0 transfers
attack.body: They watch your transactions, generate nearly identical addresses, then flood your history with fake transfers. Then, they hope you copy the lookalike address.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: Every lookalike address is flagged
protection.body: Suspicious transactions are flagged directly on Etherscan so you can spot them instantly.

ads.title: Ad Warnings
ads.description: Fake ads mimic real crypto sites across platforms. We flag them before you click.

coinbase_ad.title: Coinbase — Sign In
coinbase_ad.description: Fast access to your account. Verify to continue. Hardware wallet support.

uniswap_ad.title: Uniswap — Claim Bonus
uniswap_ad.description: Limited-time reward. Connect wallet to verify eligibility.

organic.title: Coinbase: Buy & Sell Crypto
organic.description: The easiest place to buy and sell cryptocurrency. Start with as little as $10.

attack.label: THE TRAP
attack.title: Fake ads mimic real crypto sites.
attack.body: Scammers buy sponsored placements on Google, CoinGecko, DEXTools and more. One click lands you on a fake site designed to steal credentials or trick you into signing away your assets.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: All sponsored results are labeled and dimmed.
protection.body: We flag paid placements across platforms so you can't mistake an ad for a real result. Legitimate, organic links stay bright.

antiphish.title: Malicious Site Protection
antiphish.description: If you land on a flagged website, we show a full‑page warning so you can get back to safety — or proceed if you’re sure.

card.title: This website might be harmful
card.blocked_desc: Attackers may trick you into doing something dangerous.
bullets: Secret Recovery Phrase or password theft
Malicious transactions resulting in stolen assets
card.partner_flag: Flagged as malicious by security partners

attack.label: THE TRAP
attack.title: Lookalike and phishing sites steal secrets or trigger malicious signatures.
attack.body: Typosquatting, sponsored results, and hacked redirects land you on fake pages that ask for your seed phrase or trick you into signing.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: Full‑page warnings on risky sites
protection.body: We block known phishing, malware, and scam sites so you don't proceed by mistake. You're always in control — bypass if you're sure.

coverage.title: Wallet Drain Coverage
coverage.description: Get your money back if our warnings miss these scams

contracts.title: MALICIOUS CONTRACT CALLS
contracts.description: Drainer contracts that steal your assets

address.title: ADDRESS POISONING
address.description: Scammers flood your history with lookalikes

permit.title: PERMIT SIGNATURE ATTACKS
permit.description: One signature gives unlimited spending power

coverage.subtitle: MAX COVERAGE PER USER

risk.label: THE RISK
risk.title: Even with security tools, sophisticated attacks can slip through.
risk.body: Security isn't perfect. Exploits emerge daily.

protection.label: YOUR SAFETY NET
protection.title: If we fail to catch it, we'll make it right.
protection.body: File a claim. We will hand review each claim. Up to $30,000 reimbursement per user per calendar year.

coverage.toggle_subtext: 0.8% per transaction fee when coverage is turned on.

modal.title: Are you sure you want to disable coverage?
modal.description: If you make a simple mistake, or are tricked, there's no bailout. The following losses would have been covered, reimbursed events:

experimental.title: Experimental Features Lab
experimental.description: Community-driven features we’re testing to make your crypto life better and safer.

attack.label: THE IMPERSONATION
attack.title: Scammers reply as fake OP accounts
attack.body: Imposters create lookalike accounts and flood popular threads with malicious links, exploiting trust in the original poster.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: Visual badges expose imposters
protection.body: Green “OP” badges mark the original poster. Red “NOT OP” badges reveal fakes, even with Unicode tricks.

attack.label: THE UNKNOWN
attack.title: Who can you trust on X?
attack.body: Without reputation context, it’s hard to know if an account is credible or a serial scammer.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: On-chain reputation scores
protection.body:
High (1500+): Verified, trusted
Medium (500–1499): Building reputation
Low (0–499): New or flagged

hold.note: ⚠ First time connecting to this app. Verify the URL before proceeding.

attack.label: THE MISCLICK
attack.title: One wrong click drains your wallet
attack.body: Phishing sites trick you into quick approvals. By the time you realize, it’s too late.

protection.label: YOUR PROTECTION
protection.title: 3-second hold requirement
protection.body: On first connection to unwhitelisted sites. Trusted platforms skip this entirely.

summary.title: You're Protected
summary.subtitle: All protections are active. You can edit any setting anytime.
